Articles.Content:
Just stumbled on this.  Looks intriguing - but maybe also not? 

 

Can't figure out if it's just a gussied up arcade game and whether that's OK or not 

 

Anyone?

I took a chance on it. - on sale for $20.

Supposed to be basically a naval-sim type of playstyle, but the look is quite different.  Not really played naval sims - but I do like strategy games.

Seems it has a lot of depth and a big learning curve.
